Sentencas: NiO-Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-delta cermet anode powders with flake-shaped particles have been synthesized using a unique micro-emulsion-mediated solvothermal process.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of morphologically tailored NiO-Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-δ anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells: A micro-emulsion followed by solvothermal approach

Sentencas: With an increase in the amount of urea used as a precipitation agent, the particles change from plate to flake shape in a morphological transition.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of morphologically tailored NiO-Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-δ anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells: A micro-emulsion followed by solvothermal approach

Sentencas: Well-developed flake-shaped anode powders can be obtained from 24 h of solvothermal treatment.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of morphologically tailored NiO-Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-δ anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells: A micro-emulsion followed by solvothermal approach

Sentencas: The polarization resistance at 800 degrees C in humidified H-2 and the activation energy of the anode synthesized with 1:4 salt to urea ratio and the solvothermal treatment duration of 24 h are 0.01 Omega cm(2) and 0.53 eV, respectively.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of morphologically tailored NiO-Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-δ anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells: A micro-emulsion followed by solvothermal approach

Sentencas: In accordance with the polarization resistance results, a single cell with the MEST4 anode shows a high maximum-power density of 0.32 W cm(-2), at 800 degrees C with a humidified H-2 fuel.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of morphologically tailored NiO-Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-δ anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells: A micro-emulsion followed by solvothermal approach
